main_definition: A visual representation of data, typically in the form of a graph or table.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To plan and track progress over time
meanings_and_examples.example: The project manager will chart our team's milestones to monitor our progress.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A visual representation of data or statistics
meanings_and_examples.example: She used a pie chart to display the sales distribution among different regions.
Before starting his new job, he had to chart all the items in stock at the warehouse.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A navigational tool on a ship or aircraft
meanings_and_examples.example: The captain used the nautical chart to navigate through the stormy seas.
